this method sends to server id and park and its update the enter time for traveler with order in DB

this method sends to server id and park and its update the enter time for casual traveler in DB

updateManagerDiscount(String, String, String, String) - Method in class SqlConnector.sqlConnector
update Manager Discount - always set status: 'waitingForApprove' after update
updateParkChangeRequestStatus(String) - Method in class SqlConnector.sqlConnector
Description of updateParkChangeRequestStatus: updateParkChangeRequestStatus will update request status in DB so we will be able to display to department manager only requests which he did not touch yet (and only them!)
updateParkChangesInParkTable(String, String, String, String) - Method in class SqlConnector.sqlConnector
Description of updateParkChangesInParkTable: updateParkChangesInParkTable will update park with settings as requested by park manager.
updateStatusForCapacityParkToFull(String) - Method in class Controller.ParkController
this method sends to server park name and update the status of capacityfull table
updateUnexpectedVisitors(String[]) - Method in class SqlConnector.sqlConnector
this method update amount of unexpected visitors in park
usageReportController - Class in GUI
This GUI will give to the park manager an option to do report about usage in the park.

userController - Static variable in class Client.ClientUI
 
UserController - Class in Controller
-----------------------------Class explanation------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This class is a controller this class will contain an instance of person which can be traveller, pre order traveller or any of GoNature's members this class will produce more functionality to the client side
